import pickle
import requests
response = requests.get('http://www.pythonchallenge.com/pc/def/banner.p').content
banner = pickle.loads(response)
print(type(banner))
print(banner[:5])

for pat in banner:
    print("".join([x[0] * x[1] for x in pat]))
